summary: MY 2009 TOYOTA COROLLA HAS HAD AN EXCESSIVE AMOUNT OF OIL CONSUMPTION DUE TO TOYOTA PUTTING IN DEFECTED PISTON AND PISTON RINGS. THIS DEFECT CAN CAUSE ENGINE DAMAGE OR ENGINE FAILURE RESULTING IN HAVING TO REPLACE THE ENTIRE ENGINE.   THESE OTHER MODELS MAY ALSO BE AFFECTED: TOYOTA CAMRY 2007-2011  TOYOTA CAMRY HYBRID  2007-20011 TOYOTA COROLLA  2009 TOYOTA MATRIX  2009 TOYOTA RAV4  TOYOTA SOLARA 2007, 2008  SCION XB 2008 2009  SCION TC 2007-2009
